description: even" data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" version below*** data-editor="2ins2" data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" pronti per il prossimo grande evento di esn trento? data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" giorni di puro divertimento sulla neve vi aspettano. data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" sciare tutto il giorno, fare pausa agli àpres ski il pomeriggio e venire a ballare con noi ad esclusivi party la sera! data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" 14 al 17 marzo a folgaria. data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" fee è di 220 euro più 25 euro di cauzione che vi verranno restituiti a fine evento. comprende: 3 notti con cene e colazioni, skipass 4 giorni, ingresso ai 3 party, trasporto in pullman da trento. (ps: per iscriversi è obbligatorio essere in possesso della tessera esn) data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" attrezzatura: data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" completo: 30 (tuta esclusa) data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" solo sci/snowboard: 25 data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" scarponi: 15  data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" casco: 5 data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" lezioni sci/snowboard: 25 data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" giovedì 14 marzo ore 7.00, ritrovo alla fermata dei bus della funivia. data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" domenica 17 marzo ore 19.00. data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" di 100 euro entro il 31 gennaio. data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" di 145 (più eventuale attrezzatura/lezioni ecc.) entro il 18 febbraio. data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" venire a pagare in ufficio esn, aperto ogni lunedì e giovedì dalle 18.00 alle 20.00. data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" il form per la pre-iscrizione: data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" out data-editor="2ins2" data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" aspettiamo!!! data-editor="2ins2" data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" data-editor="2ins2" data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" you ready for the next big esn trento event? data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" days of fun in the snow!! data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" can ski all the day, take a break at the àpres-ski bars in the afternoon and come to dance with us at the exclusive party in the evening! data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" 14th to 17th march in folgaria. data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" fee is 220 euro plus 35 euro deposit which will be returned to you at the end of the event. it includes: 3 nights with dinner and breakfast, 4 days ski pass, entry to the 3 parties, transport by bus from trento. (ps: to register you must have the esncard) data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" rental: data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" full:  30 (snow jacket and trousers excluded) data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" only ski / snowboard:  25 data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" boots:  15 data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" helmet:  5 data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" lessons ski / snowboard: 25  data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" 14th of march at 7.00 am, meeting point: the bus station next to the cable car. data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" sunday, 17th of march at 7.00 pm. data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" of 100 euro until 31. january. data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" of 145 euro ( + equipment, lessons, etc.) until 18. february. data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" can come to pay in the esn office, open every and from 6.00 to 8.00 pm. data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" in the form for the pre-registration: data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" out data-editor="2ins2" data-editor="2ins2" _1mj" are waiting for you!!!
